title: Senior Software Engineer
short_description: Highly skilled and motivated software engineer with expertise in data engineering and a strong background in Java, Python, and JavaScript. Experienced in a variety of frameworks, libraries, cloud platforms, and version control systems. Proficient in Agile methodologies and task management tools. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from BSUIR.
bullets: 7+ years of hands-on experience in develping web platforms in different business domains
Results-Driven Achievements: Delivered solutions for challenging interactions between technologies. Led a small team to complete the TangoVote prototype
Data Engineering Proficiency: Hands-on experience in Python, PySpark, and Azure Databricks. Completed Udemy course on Azure Databricks & Spark for Data Engineers
Leadership & Solution Design: Led projects, made architectural decisions, and developed solutions for successful project delivery
Cloud & Database Expertise: Knowledgeable in cloud platforms (Azure, Hetzner) and databases (PostgreSQL, OracleSQL, MySQL, Liquibase) for scalable and efficient application development.
Highly Skilled Software Engineer: Proficient in Java, Python, and JavaScript with expertise in data engineering. Experienced in frameworks, libraries, cloud platforms, and version control systems.

education.name: BSUIR, Bachelor's degree in Computer Science

prizes_appraisals: 2nd diploma diploma of Republic Olympiad in informatics 2010.
Participant of ACM IСPC Belarus and Baltics Regional Contest (ACM 1/4 finals).

bullets: Obtained knowledge and experience in a new area of software development - data engineering
Completed Udemy course Azure Databricks & Spark For Data Engineers (PySpark / SQL)

projects.name: Dataplatform
projects.description: Event driven data platform with self-servicing support
projects.technologies: Python, PySpark, Azure Databricks, PostgreSQL, Liquibase, Kafka, Git, Linux, Docker, JIRA
projects.responsibilities: Implementation of data engineering solutions, bug fixing, analyzing and grooming tickets.

bullets: Took initiative to do performance testing of several approaches on R'n'D stage of development.
Faced undocumented and unpredictable behaviour in interaction between apache camel and spring boot actuator prometheus and came up with working solution (wrote an article about it).
Developed and implemented way to configure complex routes in Apache Camel with content based conditions and incoming-outcoming throttling.

projects.name: Ehealth
projects.description: Web platform for IT support of health industry in Belarus sponsored by World Bank (Including patents-doctors functionalities, portal for pharmacies).
projects.technologies: Java 11, Apache Camel, Microservices, Spring Boot 2+, String (Data, MVC, Cloud, Test), Keycloak, Liquibase, PostgreSQL, Docker, HTML5, CSS3.
projects.responsibilities: Back-end development and support, providing documentation, helding demos to the management, bug fixing, participated in development of architecture of several services and business requirements.

bullets: Technically lead small TangoVote demo project (2 people) from beginning to the end. Done this with mentorship of the head of oracle department of the company.
Had been an author of several architectural decisions about how to implement several services and interaction between them. Also took part in implementing them.
